open.description: Icon to indicate the open action.

close.description: Icon to indicate the close action.

position.description: Position of the toggle icon. Valid values: `start`, `end`.

color.description: Background color for the heading. Defaults to the base background color.

gap.description: Gap between the icon and the heading.

block.description: Padding space above and below the heading. Equal values in the block axis.

inline.description: Padding space left and right of the heading. Equal values in the inline axis.

color.description: Text color for the heading in `hover` state.
Background color for the heading in `hover` state. Defaults to the heading background color.
Text color for the heading in `focus` state.
Background color for the heading in `focus` state. Defaults to the heading background color.
Color of the keyboard focus outline. Defaults to the focus color.

block.description: Padding space above and below the content. Equal values in the block axis.

inline.description: Padding space left and right of the content. Equal values in the inline axis.

spacer.description: Space at the start of the content if an icon exists at the start of the heading.
